cause.description:
Mehrnoushe Solouki is an independant filmmaker arrested in Iran in February 2007, held in prison and then reseased on bail. The government of Iran prevents her from leaving the country and is accusing her of "endangering national security".
Visit : www.freesolouki.org for details and to sign the petition demanding her immediate release.
For now, we do not ask for donations.
1. Freedom of speech
cause.mission: The safe release of Mehrnoushe Solouki from Iran.
cause.name: Free Mehrnoushe Solouki
